page.title: 12BRIERLEY HILL, CHANGES
page.content: At one end of the{High Street stands the{Brierley Hill Civic Hall and this popular place of entertainment has a repertoire ranging from wrestling to classical music concerts. The area it serves has altered over the last ten years as many large new housing developments have sprung up in the district. Despite the changes,{Brierley Hill {High Street}is still a popular shopping area and retains some of the traditional High Street atmosphere. It is however, set for further, more drastic changes soon, as a new vast development containing a shopping precinct, leisure centre and office space nears completion. Judging by the local press, this new development although welcomed by some, is seen by others as another nail in the coffin of{Brierley Hill High Street.
